metadata.description: Location of the data factory. Currently, only East US, East US 2, and West Europe are supported.
The name of the SQL logical server.
The administrator username of the SQL logical server.
The administrator password of the SQL logical server.
Allow Azure services to access server.
The name of the SQL Database.
The name of the Data Warehouse.

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SourceCSV
SourceCSV sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapseStagingSink

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sourceSynapseStagingTable
sourceSynapseStagingTable sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	postSQLs:['\n'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapseOperationalTable

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SourceCSV
SourceCSV sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapseStagingSink
SourceCSV sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLStagingSink

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sourceSynapseStagingTable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSqlDbStaging
sourceSynapseStagingTable sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	postSQLs:['\n'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapseOperationalTable
sourceSqlDbStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SqlOperationalSink
